name: A Sketch Stickman Ninja Run FREE
name_original: A Sketch Stickman Ninja Run FREE
description:
"Kick The Stick Out OF Them!"

Take control of Stickman Ninja in this epic battle across
the temple roof tops.

Take no prisoners & destroy them all. Just watch out, the action gets fast and frantic and the bad guys want you dead.

It's time to kick some stick!

Features Include:

• Fast and frantic run and gun action
• Real time multiplayer with friends
• NEW REPLAY Feature - rewatch your last go and share the video footage on FaceBook, Twitter or YouTube.
• Intuitive controls
• Character and weapon upgrades including:
- Blue Stickman Ninja - Weapon: Twin Sai
- Red Stickman Ninja - Weapon: Shuriken Throwing Star
- Pink Stickwoman - Weapon: Nunchucks
- The RARE Chameleon Ninja - Weapon: Boomerang

Download now FREE and STICK it to them!
